Acute lymphoblastic leukemia/lymphoma , acute myelogenous leukemia , Burkitt 's lymphoma remission . 2 . Relapsed lymphoma , include marginal zone B cell lymphoma , follicular lymphoma , chemotherapy-sensitive large-cell Hodgkin lymphoma . 3 . Myelodysplastic Syndrome ( MDS ) 4 . Blastic plasmacytoid dendritic cell neoplasm Primary Objective : The primary objective determine overall survival 180 day transplantation involve Myeloablative Non myeloablative conditioning , HLA-haploidentical marrow peripheral blood stem cell graft , post-transplant Cyclophosphamide GVHD prophylaxis .
